Detailed Description

Reads the ASCII population data available at http://sedac.ciesin.columbia.edu/gpw.

Author:
Valliappa.Lakshmanan

00058         // create output directory
00059         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("globalpop");
00060         
00061         // read input
00062         LatLonGrid popdensity = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA).crop(900, 2500, 200, 200);
00063         
00064         // write out as image, for viewing
00065         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "popdensity", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());

00067         
00068         // show impact of colormap and log scaling
00069         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "rainbow", PngWriter.createHotColormap());

00071         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "logdensity", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
